
{{alias}}( x, n )
    Cumulatively tests whether at least n array elements in a provided
    array are truthy.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ArrayLikeObject
       Input array.
    n: integer
       Number of elements to be truthy.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array
        Output array.

    Examples
    --------
    > var x = [ false, false, false, true, true ];
    > var n=2;
    > var y = {{alias}}( x, n )
    [ false, false, false, false, true ];


{{alias}}.assign( x, n, y, stride, offset )
    Cumulatively tests whether at least n array elements in a provided
    array are truthy and assigns results to provided output array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ArrayLikeObject
        Input array.

    n: integer
        Number of elements to be truthy in array.

    y: ArrayLikeObject
        Output array.

    stride: integer
        Output array stride.

    offset: integer
        Output array offset.

    Returns
    -------
    y: ArrayLikeObject
        Output array.

    Examples
    --------
    > var x = [ false, false, false, true, true ];
    > var y = [ false, null, false, null, false, null, true, null, false ];
    > var n=2;
    > var result = {{alias}}.assign( x, n, y, 2, 0 )
    [ false, null, false, null, false, null, false, null, true ];

    See Also
    --------
